R

read(String) - Static method in class util.TextDB
method to read the data stored in the text file of the given file path
Review - Class in entity
Review inherits AbstractEntity
Review(String, String, int) - Constructor for class entity.Review
constructor
Review(String) - Constructor for class entity.Review
constructor to store the user's username, review of the movie and the rating given in a text file
ReviewCRUD<T extends Review> - Class in crud
ReviewCRUD inherits AbstractCRUD whereby attributes from AbstractCRUD is replaced by attributes from Review
ReviewCRUD(Class<T>, int) - Constructor for class crud.ReviewCRUD
constructor
run(int) - Method in class ui.BookAndPurchaseUI
method to allow user to choose whether to book a seat and purchase a ticket or not choice '0' calls method startBook() to prompt user on the steps to purchase a ticket choice '1' displays initial menu for users, under UserUI class
run(int) - Method in class ui.ListTopMoviesUI
method to allow user to display top 5 movies either by overall ratings or number of tickets sold choice '0' prints the top 5 movies by overall ratings choice '1' prints the top 5 movies by number of tickets sold choice '2' returns to the previous menu
run(String, String) - Method in class ui.LoginCreateUI
create an account with the username and password input 2 accounts with the same username is not allowed
run(int) - Method in class ui.LoginCRUDUI
case '0' display LoginCreateUI menu case '1' display menu enter username and password case '2' go back to previous menu, LoginUI
run(int) - Method in class ui.LoginUI
choice '0' to create UserAccount object choice '1' to create StaffAccount object choice '2' to exit program
run(String, String) - Method in class ui.LoginValidateUI
check username and password details if username and password is valid, login successful else print "wrong login info" and return to LoginCRUDUI display
run(int) - Method in class ui.MovieCRUDUI
method to create or update movie choice '0' calls method startCreate() to create movie details choice '1' calls method startUpdate() to update movie details choice '2' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.MovieDetailUI
method for user to access movie details, review and to add their reviews of the movie choice '0' prints the attributes of the movie choice '1' prints the list of reviews of the particular movie choice '2' allows the user to add their reviews and ratings of the particular movie choice '3' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.MovieListUI
method to list all movies available or to search for movie by its name choice '0' prints the list of movies available in the cinema choice '1' searches for the movie by the name input choice '2' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.MovieStaffUI
method to list and view movie details or edit movie listing choice '0' enters the menu in MovieListUI class choice '1' enters the menu in MovieCRUDUI class choice '2' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.MovieUpdateDetailUI
method to update the details/attributes of a particular movie choice '0' updates the title of the movie choice '1' updates the status of the movie if it is available in the cinema or not choice '2' updates the type of movie, based on the enumerations in MovieType class choice '3' updates the film classification guidelines, based on the enumerations in MovieRating class choice '4' updates the synopsis of the particular movie choice '5' updates the name of the director choice '6' updates the list of casts in the movie choice '7' updates the duration of the movie choice '8' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.PriceChangeUI
method for user to choose an option to carry out choice '0' creates a new object with the input as the new price for the given movie type choice '1' creates a new object with the input as the new price for the given cinema class choice '2' creates a new object with the input as the new price for the given age range choice '3' creates a new object with the input as the new price for the given day type choice '4' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.PublicHolidayCRUDUI
method to create, list or delete the public holiday date and name choice '0' creates a public holiday with the input of the date and name choice '1' lists the saved public holidays choice '2' deletes the data of the saved public holiday choice '3' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.SettingsUI
method for staff user to input which menu to enter choice '0' enters the menu to change the price allocation, under PriceChangeUI choice '1' enters the menu to edit the public holiday data, under PublicHolidayCRUDUI choice '2' returns to the previous menu
run(Cineplex, String, Cinema, String, Movie) - Method in class ui.ShowtimesCRUDUI
method to create a new showtime object for a movie, with the given parameters as attributes
run(int, String) - Method in class ui.ShowtimesListUI
method for user to view and select the available showtimes for the movies of their choice
run(int) - Method in class ui.ShowtimesStaffUI
method to list the showtimes for a cinema or create a showtime for the cinema choice '0' lists all the showtimes of all movies for a particular cinema choice '1' displays the menu to create showtimes in a cinema, under ShowtimesCRUDUI class choice '2' returns to the previous menu
run(int) - Method in class ui.StaffUI
method for staff user to choose movie listing, cinema showtimes or system settings to edit choice '0' displays the menu to edit the move listings, under MovieStaffUI class choice '1' displays the menu to edit the cinema showtimes, under ShowtimesStaffUI class choice '2' displays the menu to edit the pricing or public holiday, under SettingsUI
run(int) - Method in class ui.UserUI
method for user to search/list movie, choose timeslots of the movies in the cinema, view their booking history or list the top 5 ranks of movies choice '0' displays the menu in MovieListUI class choice '1' displays the menu in ShowtimesListUserUI class choice '2' prints the booking history of the current user choice '3' displays the menu in ListTopMoviesUI class choice '4' exits the program
runBook(int, int[]) - Method in class ui.BookAndPurchaseUI
method to show the total price of the user's purchase and calls method to update number of tickets sold as well as calculation of the price
runCreate(int, String, int, int, int, String, String, ArrayList<String>, int) - Method in class ui.MovieCRUDUI
method to create new movie object with the parameters as the attributes of the movie
runCreate(String, String) - Method in class ui.PublicHolidayCRUDUI
method to use the input of date and time to create a new public holiday object
runDelete(int) - Method in class ui.PublicHolidayCRUDUI
method to delete the public holiday object
runPrice(int) - Method in class ui.BookAndPurchaseUI
method to call PriceCRUD to calculate the total price of the tickets given the variables of categories that the user chose and to print the receipt
runSearch(String) - Method in class ui.MovieListUI
method to search for the movie based on the name input by user
runUpdate(int) - Method in class ui.MovieCRUDUI
method to update the attributes of movie selected
